item.title: 据说 Circle IPO 定价将高于发行价范围，筹资 11 亿美元
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，Circle Internet Group Inc.及其部分股东在一次规模更大的首次公开募股中筹集了近 11 亿美元，其股票定价高于市场范围，这表明稳定币发行商正在赢得更多的认可。【原文：Circle Internet Group Inc. and some of its shareholders raised nearly $1.1 billion in an upsized initial public offering, according to a person familiar with the matter, pricing its shares above a marketed range in a sign that stablecoin issuers are winning greater acceptance.】

item.title: 贸易战为何让美国通胀暂时保持低迷？
item.description:
在本周的特朗普经济学节目中，我们将讨论消费者的悲观情绪以及对唐纳德-特朗普关税的法律挑战可能会如何演变。【原文：

On this week’s episode of Trumponomics, we discuss consumer pessimism and how legal challenges to Donald Trump’s tariffs might play out.

】

item.title: 中国人比已知的无线网络入侵事件早一年入侵美国电信系统
item.description: 企业调查人员发现了中国黑客在 2023 年夏天入侵一家美国电信公司的证据，表明中国攻击者入侵美国通信系统的时间早于公众所知的时间。【原文：Corporate investigators found evidence that Chinese hackers broke into an American telecommunications company in the summer of 2023, indicating the country’s attackers penetrated the US communications system earlier than publicly known.】

item.title: Planet Labs 首席执行官称乌克兰战争引发欧洲需求疲软
item.description: 地球成像公司 Planet Labs PBC 的利润超出预期，因为欧洲为应对美国从欧洲大陆撤军而增加了国防开支。【原文：Earth imaging company Planet Labs PBC’s profit beat expectations as Europe hikes defense spending in response to the United States pulling back from the continent.】

item.title: 瑞银资产管理公司称日本应停止发行长期债券以阻止股市下跌
item.description: 一位资深投资组合经理为日本提出了一些建议：为了平息日本政府债券市场的波动，停止发行期限超过 30 年的债券。【原文：A veteran portfolio manager has some advice for Japan: To calm volatility in the country’s government bond market, stop issuing debt with maturities above 30 years.】

item.title: 特朗普预算案要求削减 BLS，引发对经济数据质量的担忧
item.description: 特朗普政府正在提议削减劳工统计局的资源，而该机构已经在多年的预算限制中疲于奔命，这进一步加剧了人们对美国经济数据质量和数量的担忧。【原文：The Trump administration is proposing to cut resources from the Bureau of Labor Statistics when the agency is already reeling from years of budget constraints, further compounding concerns about the quality and quantity of data produced about the US economy.】

item.title: 美国银行称 Robinhood 是 S&P 500 指数增持的 "最佳候选者
item.description: 据美国银行（Bank of America Corp）称，Robinhood Markets Inc.是在周五宣布的重新平衡中进入S&P 500指数的 "主要候选者"，这一里程碑将刺激被动型基金抢购这家在线经纪公司的股票。【原文：Robinhood Markets Inc. is a “prime candidate” to enter the S&P 500 Index in the rebalancing set to be announced Friday, a milestone that would spur passive funds to snap up shares of the online brokerage, according to Bank of America Corp.】

item.title: 基金创始人乔治-韦斯因杰富瑞债务申请破产
item.description: 对冲基金创始人乔治-韦斯（George Weiss）在联邦法官裁定他应为其同名公司拖欠杰富瑞金融集团（Jefferies Financial Group Inc.【原文：Hedge fund founder George Weiss has filed personal bankruptcy months after a federal judge ruled he’s liable for more than $100 million in debt his eponymous firm owes Jefferies Financial Group Inc.】

item.title: 网络调查人员检查涉嫌黑客乘坐喷气机的视频
item.description: 2025年5月20日星期二，美国华盛顿，美国国务卿马可-鲁比奥（Marco Rubio）在参议院国家、对外行动及相关项目拨款小组委员会听证会上。听证会正在审查美国国务院2026财年的预算申请。摄影师：内森-霍华德/布鲁姆伯格【原文：Marco Rubio, US secretary of state, during a Senate Appropriations Subcommittee on State, Foreign Operations, and Related Programs hearing in Washington, DC, US, on Tuesday, May 20, 2025. The hearing is reviewing the fiscal year 2026 budget request for the US Department of State. Photographer: Nathan Howard/Bloomberg】

item.title: 特朗普从 CBO 新的税收和关税估算中暂时获胜
item.description: 无党派的国会预算办公室周三向共和党人提供了一个重要的政治话题，其预测显示，唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税可能会带来比他的巨额减税计划损失更多的联邦收入。【原文：The nonpartisan Congressional Budget Office handed Republicans a major political talking point Wednesday, with projections that showed the possibility for President Donald Trump’s tariffs to bring in more federal revenue than will be lost by his giant tax-cut plan.】

item.title: 塔可贸易将在七月爆发
item.description: 事实证明，唐纳德-特朗普的可塑性比许多金融界人士最初预期的要大得多。股票市场适应得很好，现在交易的主题是特朗普总是畏缩不前（简称TACO）。这帮助上个月 S&P 500 指数上涨了 7%。但这种情况会持续下去吗？在 90 天的对等关税期限到来时，特朗普会再次屈服吗？【原文：Donald Trump has proven to be a lot more malleable than many in the financial world initially anticipated. Equity markets have adapted well, and now trade on the theme that Trump always chickens out (or TACO for short). That helped the S&P 500 gain 7% last month. But will this last? And will Trump capitulate again when the 90-day reciprocal tariff deadline comes?】

item.title: Reddit 起诉 Anthropic，称人工智能公司利用用户数据
item.description: Reddit 公司起诉人工智能公司 Anthropic，称其未经许可使用该社交媒体公司的内容来训练其人工智能模型。【原文：Reddit Inc. sued artificial intelligence firm Anthropic, saying it has used the social media company’s content without permission to train its AI models.】

item.title: 价格上涨后普利司通停止采购利比里亚橡胶
item.description: 在政府提高支付给种植者的价格后，Firestone Liberia LLC 已停止从农民手中购买橡胶。【原文：Firestone Liberia LLC has halted rubber purchases from farmers after the government raised the price paid to growers.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行在布罗德尔事件中任命普雷托为新会计主管
item.description: 桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）已提名曼努埃尔-普雷托（Manuel Preto）为其新任首席会计官，放弃了任命被前雇主指控欺诈的前伊塔乌联合银行控股公司（Itau Unibanco Holding SA）首席财务官亚历山德罗-布罗德尔-洛佩斯（Alexsandro Broedel Lopes）的计划。【原文：Banco Santander SA has nominated Manuel Preto to become its new chief accounting officer, dropping plans to appoint former Itau Unibanco Holding SA Chief Financial Officer Alexsandro Broedel Lopes who has been accused of fraud by his former employer.】

item.title: 马杜罗逮捕外汇网站工作人员，委内瑞拉人被蒙在鼓里
item.description: 尼古拉斯-马杜罗总统镇压了一个不起眼的社交媒体账户，而委内瑞拉人正是依靠这个账户来浏览该国扭曲的货币市场，这在交易商和居民中造成了混乱。【原文：President Nicolas Maduro’s crackdown on an obscure social media account that Venezuelans relied on to navigate the country’s twisted currency market is sowing confusion among traders and residents alike.】

item.title: CrowdStrike 称司法部和证交会已就公司会计问题发出询问
item.description: CrowdStrike Holdings Inc.表示，美国官员要求该公司提供与一些客户的交易账目相关的信息，并称该网络安全公司正在配合调查。【原文：CrowdStrike Holdings Inc. said US officials have asked for information related to the accounting of deals it’s made with some customers and said the cybersecurity firm is cooperating with the inquiry.】

item.title: 美联储发布《米色报告》：美国经济活动减弱，物价上涨
item.description: 美联储在其《米色手册》（Beige Book）地区商业联系人调查中表示，最近几周美国经济活动略有下降，表明关税和不确定性的上升正在波及整个经济。【原文：Economic activity declined slightly in the US in recent weeks, indicating tariffs and elevated uncertainty are rippling across the economy, the Federal Reserve said in its Beige Book survey of regional business contacts.】

item.title: 不确定的不仅仅是贸易政策
item.description:
关注 "美丽的大账单"。【原文：

Pay attention to the One Big, Beautiful Bill.

】

item.title: 特朗普的兼并监管机构将更乐于批准和谈判交易
item.description: 美国司法部兼并执法部门负责人表示，在唐纳德-特朗普总统的领导下，反垄断监管机构将对批准并购持更加开放的态度。【原文：Antitrust watchdogs will be more open to approving acquisitions under President Donald Trump, according to the US Justice Department’s head of merger enforcement.】

item.title: 欧洲希望通过新标签化解资本市场僵局
item.description: 一个欧洲国家集团正在联手实施一项新举措，帮助将更多储蓄注入欧洲大陆的经济，因为该地区正努力加快资本市场一体化和深化的进程。【原文：A group of European countries is teaming up on a new initiative to help funnel more savings into the continent’s economy, as the region tries to accelerate progress on integrating and deepening its capital markets.】

item.title: 耶鲁大学即将达成出售 25 亿美元私募股权的交易
item.description: 耶鲁大学对私募股权和风险投资的追捧催生了一大批追随者，而在潜在的税制改革之前，耶鲁大学正在敲定出售其中多达 25 亿美元的资产。【原文：Yale University, whose embrace of private equity and venture capital spawned legions of followers, is finalizing the sale of as much as $2.5 billion of those assets ahead of potential tax changes.】

item.title: 雷克瑟姆足球俱乐部考虑以高达 4.75 亿美元的估值筹集资金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，好莱坞明星瑞安-雷诺兹（Ryan Reynolds）和罗伯-麦克艾伦尼（Rob McElhenney）拥有的威尔士足球俱乐部雷克瑟姆足球俱乐部（Wrexham AFC）正在考虑出售股份，估值高达 3.5 亿英镑（约合 4.75 亿美元）。【原文：Wrexham AFC, the Welsh football club owned by Hollywood stars Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney, is considering selling a stake for a valuation of up to £350 million ($475 million), people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 清湖支持的宠物公司在贷款人削减贷款时赢得了时间和金钱
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Clearlake Capital 支持的 Wellness Pet Company 获得了新的融资，并完成了债务交易的第一步，即债权人减免原贷款额的价值。【原文：Clearlake Capital-backed Wellness Pet Company snagged fresh financing and completed the first step of a debt deal that involves creditors taking a reduction in the value of the original amount they lent, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 联邦通信委员会委员西明顿卸任，加入斯塔克斯行列
item.description: 联邦通信委员会的两名成员宣布将于本周离职。【原文：Two members of the Federal Communications Commission announced that they’ll leave the agency this week.】

item.title: 部长表示，意大利将加强 STMicro，而非将其拆分
item.description: 意大利工业部长阿道夫-乌索（Adolfo Urso）表示，意大利打算加强陷入困境的半导体公司意法半导体公司（STMicroelectronics NV），该公司是意大利与法国的合资企业。【原文：Italy intends to strengthen embattled semiconductor company STMicroelectronics NV, a joint venture with France, Industry Minister Adolfo Urso said.】

item.title: 墨西哥下任首席大法官希望废除传统黑袍
item.description: 墨西哥最高法院新法官的选举引发了新的争议，这次争议的焦点是他们的着装。【原文：The contentious election of new Supreme Court judges in Mexico has unleashed a fresh controversy, this time over their attire.】

item.title: 解读阻碍中美贸易和平的稀土之争
item.description: 5 月初，中美两国在日内瓦就降低关税和其他壁垒达成一致，市场为之欢呼。但几周后，这一协议的光芒开始褪去，中国指责美国通过新的限制措施违反了协议，而美国则称中国未能兑现在稀土方面的承诺。【原文：Markets cheered in early May when the US and China agreed in Geneva to lower tariffs and other barriers. But after a few weeks, the shine started to come off that deal, with China accusing the US of violating it with new restrictions and the US saying China failed to honor promises on rare earths.】

item.title: 科博尔特控股公司不会进行伦敦首次公开募股
item.description: 科博尔特控股公司（Cobalt Holdings Plc）决定不再按计划在伦敦进行首次公开募股。【原文：Cobalt Holdings Plc decided not to proceed with its planned initial public offering in London.】

item.title: 卡尼不谈关税报复，称美加谈判正在取得进展
item.description: 加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）表示，加拿大不会立即对特朗普政府加倍征收钢铝关税做出回应，并表示两国官员正在就两国之间的贸易关系进行 "深入讨论"。【原文：Prime Minister Mark Carney said Canada won’t respond immediately to the Trump administration’s doubling of steel and aluminum tariffs, and indicated that officials are in “intensive discussions” about the trade relationship between the countries.】

item.title: 英国公平竞争委员会官员艾米莉-谢泼德（Emily Shepperd）在监管机构任职四年后离职
item.description: 英国金融行为监管局（Financial Conduct Authority）表示，首席运营官艾米丽-谢泼德（Emily Shepperd）将在监管局工作四年后离职。【原文：The UK’s Financial Conduct Authority said Chief Operating Officer Emily Shepperd will depart after four years at the watchdog.】
